item.title: 马斯克旗下xAI联合创始人巴布什金将斥资5700万英镑购置伦敦豪宅
item.description: 埃隆·马斯克旗下xAI公司的联合创始人伊戈尔·巴布什金已同意以约5700万英镑（合6800万美元）的价格购入一处俯瞰伦敦海德公园的顶层公寓，创下英国逾一年来最昂贵的住宅交易纪录。【原文：Igor Babuschkin, co-founder of Elon Musk’s xAI, has agreed to buy a penthouse overlooking London’s Hyde Park for about £57 million ($68 million), marking the most expensive UK home deal in more than a year.】

item.title: 裕信银行就企业贷款相关担保权事宜为波兰PKO银行提供咨询
item.description: 裕信银行正就潜在的合成风险转移交易为波兰国家银行提供咨询，此前该波兰银行去年完成了首次此类交易。【原文：UniCredit SpA is advising PKO Bank Polski SA on a potential synthetic risk transfer transaction following the Polish lender’s debut transaction last year.】

item.title: 葡萄牙推出25亿欧元援助计划，致命洪灾持续蔓延
item.description: 葡萄牙政府批准了一系列紧急法案，以加速灾后重建工作。作为该国史上最大规模救灾行动之一，这项包含25亿欧元（约合29亿美元）援助计划的举措，旨在消除行政障碍。【原文：Portugal’s government approved a set of emergency laws to speed reconstruction after deadly flooding, clearing administrative hurdles as part of a €2.5 billion ($2.9 billion) support package in one of the largest disaster-relief efforts ever mobilized by the country.】

item.title: 印度央行行长称印度并未抛售美国国债
item.description: 印度央行行长桑杰·马尔霍特拉周五在政策会议后的记者会上表示，印度并未出售其持有的美国国债。【原文：India is not selling its US Treasury holdings, Reserve Bank of India Governor Sanjay Malhotra said at a post-policy press conference on Friday.】

item.title: 东京电子上调业绩预期，人工智能推动芯片支出增长
item.description: 东京电子公司上调全年业绩预期，尽管其季度利润未达预期。该公司表示，芯片制造商正争相投入资金以把握人工智能浪潮带来的机遇，预计相关支出将大幅增长。【原文：Tokyo Electron Ltd. raised its full-year outlook even after its quarterly profit missed estimates and said it sees a surge in spending by chipmakers eager to ride an AI spending wave.】

item.title: 美国电话电报公司推出可供家长监控的儿童智能手机
item.description: 美国电话电报公司（AT&T Inc.）周五推出一款面向儿童的手机，旨在通过新增设备将家庭用户锁定在其生态系统内。【原文：AT&T Inc. launched a phone geared toward kids on Friday, adding a device aimed at keeping families within its ecosystem.】

item.title: 总部位于迪拜的企业将向非洲人工智能和农场领域投资16亿美元
item.description: 总部位于迪拜的私营企业马瑟集团正转向投资非洲农田和数据中心，以应对技术基础设施需求激增及粮食安全需求上升的双重挑战。【原文：Maser Group, a closely held Dubai-based company, is pivoting to investment in farmland and data centers across Africa as demand for technology infrastructure and the need for food security surge.】

item.title: 对冲基金经理警告：逆势做空新兴市场将面临风险
item.description: 巴黎资产管理公司嘉明资产管理公司表示，投资者在抛售新兴市场债务前应三思而行，因资金正准备持续涌入该资产类别。【原文：Traders should think twice before selling emerging-market debt as funds are prepared to keep pouring money into the asset class, according to Paris-based money manager Carmignac Gestion SA.】

item.title: 丰田家族掌门人任命前秘书为汽车制造商下一任首席执行官
item.description: 丰田汽车公司即将上任的首席执行官不仅是公司的财务主管，他还曾担任董事长私人秘书近十年。【原文：Toyota Motor Corp.’s incoming chief executive officer isn’t just the company’s head of finance. He was the chairman’s personal secretary for almost a decade.】

item.title: 大众汽车称南非皮卡计划面临"成败关键之年"
item.description: 大众汽车集团表示，在南非启动新款皮卡生产计划的决定，将取决于税收优惠及其他行业扶持措施的改善程度。【原文：Volkswagen AG said a plan to start producing a new pick-up truck in South Africa will hinge on improved tax breaks and other incentives to boost the industry.】

item.title: 英国房价反弹至历史新高，哈利法克斯银行称
item.description: 英国最大抵押贷款机构之一称，该国房价在1月份出现反弹，这表明在工党政府公布预算案后，市场需求正在回升。【原文：UK house prices bounced back in January, according to one of the country’s largest mortgage lenders, in a sign of returning demand after the Labour government’s budget.】

item.title: 德国工业生产下滑，令复苏希望受挫
item.description: 德国工业生产自8月以来首次下滑，表明该行业在试图摆脱长期低迷之际仍面临持续挑战。【原文：German industrial production dropped for the first time since August, a sign of persisting challenges for the sector as it tries to exit a protracted slump.】

item.title: 土耳其股市强劲反弹令本土基金经理落后
item.description: 土耳其股市强势表现令当地基金经理措手不及，他们难以跟上由少数个股带动的涨势。【原文：A strong month for Turkish stocks caught local fund managers off guard as they struggled to keep up with a rally driven by a handful of stocks.】

item.title: 欧洲央行密切关注欧元走势，但斯图纳拉斯称反弹幅度不大
item.description: 欧洲央行正密切关注欧元近期涨势，但管理委员会成员扬尼斯·斯图纳拉斯认为无需担忧。【原文：The European Central Bank is keeping an eye on the euro’s recent rally but Governing Council member Yannis Stournaras sees no cause for alarm.】

item.title: 富时100指数期货下跌，英镑反弹
满载俄罗斯原油的油轮涌向东亚争夺买家
item.description: 十多艘满载俄罗斯乌拉尔原油的油轮正驶向亚洲或沿航线徘徊，这表明随着印度退出该贸易，生产商正争相将货物运往中国。【原文：More than a dozen tankers loaded with Russian Urals oil are sailing toward Asia or idling along the route, a sign of producers racing to get cargoes closer to China as India pulls back from the trade.】

item.title: 印度信实集团购入2025年中以来首船委内瑞拉原油
item.description: 信实工业有限公司在去年年中暂停进口后，已重启委内瑞拉原油采购。此举源于印度寻求多元化供应渠道，同时美国干预促使该南美国家的石油重返市场。【原文：Reliance Industries Ltd. has returned to Venezuelan crude after a pause that began in the middle of last year, as India seeks to diversify its supply and US intervention brings the South American country’s oil back to market.】

item.title: 印度央行拟允许银行向房地产投资信托基金放贷
item.description: 印度储备银行计划允许银行直接向房地产投资信托基金（REITs）提供贷款，此举有望为房地产资产释放新的资金，并推动该行业的发展。【原文：The Reserve Bank of India plans to permit banks to lend directly to real estate investment trusts, or REITs, a move that could unlock fresh funding for property assets and boost the sector’s growth.】

item.title: 油轮加速穿越霍尔木兹海峡咽喉要道，伊朗局势持续升温
item.description: 部分超级油轮运营商因担忧美伊紧张局势升级及霍尔木兹海峡航运面临的潜在风险，正加速通过该战略要冲。【原文：Some supertanker operators, nervous about rising US-Iran tensions and potential risks to shipping in the Strait of Hormuz, are speeding their vessels through the chokepoint.】

item.title: 对儿童实施社交媒体禁令可行吗？澳大利亚成为试验场
item.description: 多年来，各国政府主要依靠平台主导的安全工具来管理儿童使用社交媒体的行为。这种做法正受到越来越多的质疑。【原文：For years, governments have relied largely on platform-led safety tools to manage children’s use of social media. That approach has come under growing scrutiny.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行公布15亿欧元回购计划，此前其盈利超预期
item.description: 法国兴业银行公布第四季度盈利超出预期后，启动了14.6亿欧元（17亿美元）的股票回购计划。首席执行官斯拉沃米尔·克鲁帕重申将专注于投资者回报的承诺。【原文：Societe Generale SA launched a €1.46 billion ($1.7 billion) buyback program after posting fourth-quarter profit that beat estimates, as Chief Executive Officer Slawomir Krupa reinforced his pledge to focus on investor payouts.】

item.title: 黑石集团正为澳大利亚人工智能公司敲定35亿美元贷款
item.description: 知情人士透露，私募巨头黑石集团正敲定一笔超过50亿澳元（约合35亿美元）的贷款，用于资助澳大利亚初创企业Firmus Technologies Pty的数据中心扩建项目。这是人工智能热潮推动的最新一笔数字基础设施融资。【原文：Private credit giant Blackstone Inc. is finalizing a loan of more than A$5 billion ($3.5 billion) to fund the data center expansion of Australian startup Firmus Technologies Pty., people familiar with the matter said, the latest in digital infrastructure funding tied to the AI boom.】

item.title: 马科斯试图通过反腐赢得菲律宾选民支持，却适得其反
item.description: 去年，菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯押注于借势打击一起引发公众愤慨的贪腐丑闻，以期提升自己的政治声望。凭借2022年压倒性选举胜利的优势，打击腐败将巩固他的声誉并击退竞争对手。【原文：Last year, Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. bet he could boost his political fortunes by taking aim at a brewing graft scandal that had stirred public outrage. Building on his 2022 landslide election victory, tackling corruption would cement his reputation and fend off rivals.】

item.title: 桑切斯再度挑战特朗普，西班牙押注移民政策
item.description: 西班牙首相佩德罗·桑切斯正押注于一场大胆的赌博：接纳大批无证移民所带来的好处，将使不可避免的反弹变得值得。【原文：Spanish Prime Minister Pedro Sánchez is pursuing a bold gamble that the benefits of embracing swathes of undocumented immigrants will make the inevitable backlash worthwhile.】

item.title: 新兴市场资产或迎11月以来最糟糕一周
item.description: 新兴市场资产正面临逾两个月来最糟糕的一周，科技股和大宗商品价格的暴跌令其承压。【原文：Emerging market assets are on track for their worst week in more than two months, weighed by a rout in technology shares and commodity prices.】

item.title: Atlassian首席执行官称人工智能对公司有利，科技股下跌之际
item.description: 人工智能是Atlassian公司遭遇的最棒的事情之一，首席执行官迈克·坎农-布鲁克斯如是说。周四尾盘交易时段，该公司公布第二季度财报后股价在美国市场下跌，这发生在更广泛的人工智能驱动科技板块低迷之际。【原文：AI has been one of the best things to happen to Atlassian Corp., Chief Executive Officer Mike Cannon-Brookes said, as shares fell in the US in late Thursday trading following the company’s second-quarter results, amid a broader AI-driven tech sector slump.】
